title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 655.5 - Damaging commission property; liability therefor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 655.5 - Damaging commission property; liability therefor

State Regulations

No person shall damage, mark or deface the bridges or other
structures and appurtenances under the control of the commission. The owner and
driver of any vehicle using the bridges shall be severally liable for any
defacement or injury to the structure in which any such vehicle is involved or
by an act of any occupant of such vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
655.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
